analyzed: @92a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.🔽Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
analyzed: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /🔽ma h'a sat'v'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya / ma h'a sat'v'a ya /

original: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba du shtan pra du shtan ma ma kri te dzam bha ya /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba du shtan pra du shtan ma ma kri te dzam bha ya /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture, destroy all enemies, destroy them all, destroy those who do harm, paralyze,

original: phat phat phat/ sarba dushta stam bha ni t'a re sv'ah'a /
analyzed: phat phat phat/ sarba dushta stam bha ni t'a re sv'ah'a /
translated: Phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ. All enemies, paralyze, tāre svāhā.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Tārā is complete.
